Name: Page2_Error_N1_EmailField
Description: Error next to the email field
Default Value: Enter a valid email. The Email field cannot be empty.

Name: Page2_Error_N2_ConfirmEmailField
Description: Error next to the confirm email field
Default Value: The Confirm Email field must match the Email field

Name: Page2_Error_N3_NameField
Description: Error next to the name field
Default Value: - The Name field cannot be empty

Name: Page2_Error_N4_Address1Field
Description: Error next to the address 1 field
Default Value: - The Address Line 1 field cannot be empty - The Address Line 1 field can only contain letters, numbers, and spaces

Name: Page2_Error_N5_Address2Field
Description: Error next to the address 2 field
Default Value: - The Address Line 2 field must be either empty or only contain letters, numbers and spaces.

Name: Page2_Error_N6_CountyField
Description: Error next to the county field
Default Value: - The County field cannot be empty.

Name: Page2_Error_N7_PostCodeField
Description: Error next to the postcode field
Default Value: Please enter a valid UK postcode (OX294TP is a valid UK postcode)

Name: Page2_Error_N8_CountryField
Description: Error next to the country combo
Default Value: - The Country field cannot be empty

Name: Page4_Error_N1_CardType
Description: Error next to the cardtype combo
Default Value: The Card Type cannot be empty

Name: Page4_Error_N2_CardNumber
Description: Error next to the cardnumber field
Default Value: The Card Number cannot have less that 16 characters.
